title: Scre4m v1.0
description:
The official game of SCREAM 4. For the first time ever, play as 
the killer in a game and slash your way to victory. 

Just like the movie, killing by the Rules of Horror is the way to succeed.

Game Features:

-Fast paced single player mode where you chase down victims and avoid 
the cops 
-Be smart about who you kill and how you kill 
-Multiple fully rendered 3D levels 
-Brag about your highscores to your friends on Facebook and Twitter 
-OpenFeint integration with Achievements 
-Did we mention you play as the killer!

More info:
 <a href="
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.weinsteincompany.scre4mHD" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
